vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.12;
father of: Meshillemith (H4921)
§ Immer = "he hath said"
1) a priest in David's time
2) a priest in Jeremiah's time
3) the father of Zadok the priest
4) an ancestor of a priest
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ancestro de Masai, Amasai, sacerdote; (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos de David; (c)   jefe de familia; post exílico; (d)   lugar; (e)   padre de Pashur, sacerdote
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
音麥 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他已經說了"
1) 大衛王時的一位祭司 ( # 代 24:12| )
2) 耶利米時代的一位祭司 ( #耶 20:1| )
3) 撒督的父親, 是一位祭司 ( #尼 3:29| )
4) 一位祭司的祖先
5) 地名(?) #拉 2:59; 尼 7:61|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
音麦 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他已经说了"
1) 大卫王时的一位祭司 ( # 代 24:12| )
2) 耶利米时代的一位祭司 ( #耶 20:1| )
3) 撒督的父亲, 是一位祭司 ( #尼 3:29| )
4) 一位祭司的祖先
5) 地名(?) #拉 2:59; 尼 7:61|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.24.14
§ Immer = "he hath said"
1) a priest in David's time
2) a priest in Jeremiah's time
3) the father of Zadok the priest
4) an ancestor of a priest

§ Immer = "he hath said"
This name is used for:
1) a priest in David's time
2) a priest in Jeremiah's time
3) the father of Zadok the priest
4) an ancestor of a priest

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.29;
father of: Zadok (H6659K)
§ Immer = "he hath said"
1) a priest in David's time
2) a priest in Jeremiah's time
3) the father of Zadok the priest
4) an ancestor of a priest
